Eugene Kuleshov wrote:

>   Technically information you are hardcoding into your test hierarchy
> can be obtained automatically and test runner can reorganize test cases
> based on dependencies using quite simple static code analysis. Hey,
> anyone would like to implement this idea?! :-)

I think this is possible, but it won't provide a completion solution, 
thanks to reflection.
